title: 이달의소녀탐구 #280 (LOONA TV #280)
members: Go Won, Yves, Chuu, Choerry, ViVi
summary:
The girls learn all the dances!
0:03 -- Go Won shows her “point” dance in One & Only
0:07 -- Spoilers are meant to be short.
0:11 -- ViVi and Yves dancing Go Won’s point choreo.
0:14 -- Everyone tries the choreo.
0:21 -- Choerry teaches the Love Cherry Motion choreo!
0:31 -- “Oioioioioi~”
0:41 -- Dance medley! Everyone tries to dance Choerry’s choreo to other people’s songs
- “New”, ‘Heart Attack’, ‘Eclipse’ and ‘Singing in the Rain’.
